source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	[Document No_],
      [Line No_],
      [Type],
      [No_],
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
      [Location Code],
      [Quantity],
      [Shipment Date],
      [Description],
      [Unit of Measure],
      [Quantity (Base)],
      [Unit Price],
      [Unit Cost (LCY)],
      [Amount],
      [Gross Weight],
      [Bill-to Customer No_],
      [GST Base Amount],
      [Posting Date],
      [Unit of Measure Code],
      [Amount To Customer],
      [TCS Nature of Collection],
      [Discount Structure Code],
      [Discount Structure Amount],
      [Scheme Reason],
      [Scheme Code],
      [Scheme Parent Item No_],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Cr_Memo Line]
where year([Posting Date]) >= 2021 and year([Posting Date]) < 2023
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[Document No_],
      [Line No_],
      [Type],
      [No_],
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
